title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: McCarthy Road & Kennecott
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     McCarthy Road & Kennecott             McCarthy Road & Kennecott Area           The Kennecott and McCarthy Road area contains the Chitina Ranger Station, the Kennecott Visitor Center, and the 60 mile long McCarthy Road. Click on the map for a larger image.   McCarthy Road and Kennecott Area Containing the McCarthy Road and the towns of McCarthy and Kennecott, this area is where history comes alive. The road follows the route of the previous CRNW Railroad, starting in the town of Chitina and ending a 1/2 mile before McCarthy. Five miles from where the road ends is the Kennecott Mines National Historic Landmark.
